title: Mythicmobs问题
author: Yexiaolu
txt_content:
伪装成玩家后头上显示的那个名字怎么修改啊？

魔族游民:
  Type: PIG_ZOMBIE
  Display: '&7&n魔族游民'
  Health: 50
  Disguise:
    Type: player
    Player: YeXiaoLu
    Skin: YeXiaoLu
  Damage: 5
  LegacySkills: 
  Drops: 
  - 刀具杀意碎片 1 0.1 
  - exp 10 
  - 265 1-4 0.2 
  Equipment: 
  - 魔斧:0
  - 魔族低价铁头盔:4
  Options: 
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    FollowRange: 5 
    MovementSpeed: 0.5 



头上显示YeXiaoLu！  而不是魔族有名
怎么弄

replies.author: Yexiaolu
replies.txt_content:
zmdoyouknow 发表于 2017-6-25 08:39
Display: 'YeXiaoLu'
你理解错了  我表达有点问题....

应该是怪物的头上要显示魔族游民  而不是显示YeXiaoLu

replies.author: 梅子酒呀
replies.txt_content: Disguise那项里的player填'&7&n魔族游名' 就行了
